mutants.code:
def determine_winner(n, x, y):
    """
    Determines which king will reach the coin first on a chessboard.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The size of the chessboard (n x n).
    x (int): The x-coordinate of the coin.
    y (int): The y-coordinate of the coin.

    Returns:
    str: "White" if the white king reaches the coin first, "Black" otherwise.
    """
    white_distance = abs(1 - x) - abs(1 - y)
    black_distance = abs(n - x) + abs(n - y)
    if white_distance <= black_distance:
        return 'White'
    else:
        return 'Black'

def determine_winner(n, x, y):
    """
    Determines which king will reach the coin first on a chessboard.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The size of the chessboard (n x n).
    x (int): The x-coordinate of the coin.
    y (int): The y-coordinate of the coin.

    Returns:
    str: "White" if the white king reaches the coin first, "Black" otherwise.
    """
    white_distance = abs(1 - x) * abs(1 - y)
    black_distance = abs(n - x) + abs(n - y)
    if white_distance <= black_distance:
        return 'White'
    else:
        return 'Black'
